channel.title: How Do I Connect The Ip To The Server?
channel.description:
HEY GUYS! AND yes i have made a server (allstar) and i have made!! :D
and i have made a no-ip address and i am making a server on mopar/silab
so i need to no how to connect like the ip 2 the server coz when i type the ip in
it dosn't connect so i need to connect to the server!
i have looked realy hard for like 2 months and i have wrote this as a last resort! :eek:
so if you guys cud help me in anyway it wud mean the world 2 me!!!!!!!
THANK YOU
RYAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 03:28:51 am[/size][hr]YUP GUYS IT SAYS ALL![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 03:33:49 am[/size][hr]HELP ME NOW

item.title: How Do I Connect The Ip To The Server?
item.dc:creator: @str0wn52 str0wn52
item.description:
@str0wn52 wrote:

sup guys kk i’ll try it thannks! umm do u kno where dat tut is?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 05:37:05 pm[/size][hr][quote=“pure kirk, post:4, topic:275264”]dude u got router cause if u do your gonna have to portforward
all u have to do is make a host like xxx.no-ip.biz or sumthing like tht with ur ip then go to ur client source press run and boom ur done :d great home made sounds eh boom ftw eh?[/quote]

Dude i’m making a mopar/silab server so no 1 has 2 download anything ok…

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Connect The Ip To The Server?

item.title: How Do I Connect The Ip To The Server?
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

Manny129, there was no use posting that, same to you Pure Kirk.

If you would like someone to help you, I would suggest you remake the post with proper spelling and no bold.
I know I may not have been helping in this post, but just read it just in case it helps

First, there is a tutorial on portforwarding which is actually real simple for its length of post.
Second, use 127.0.0.1 to connect or (Yes that means leave it blank) also this would work -: localhost.
Third, add it to status pages (But at the moment I think the status page on MoparScape is totally ****ed)
Four, have fun playing with other players.

Read full topic

dude u got router cause if u do your gonna have to portforward
all u have to do is make a host like xxx.no-ip.biz or sumthing like tht with ur ip then go to ur client source press run and boom ur done :d great home made sounds eh boom ftw eh?

But ofcourse i will help you.
The no-ip conduct that you open by the small tabs on the bottom right hand coner you have should have the box inside it ticked next to where you’re ip is.
